attributes.action: Ban mandatory uniform policies in state schools / academies.
attributes.additional_details: Students should have the freedom of expressing them selfs. Wearing uniform makes them feel like workers from a young age. They should be able to wear clothes that makes them feel like them selves instead of feeling like office workers.
attributes.background: Government should ban schools making uniforms mandatory.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591532

If you want to start your own petition in the future, you will need to provide your full name.
